alert.note: Alert for Laurens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 06 at 8:05PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LAURENS AND WESTERN TREUTLEN COUNTIES... At 805 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Rentz, or 12 miles south of Dublin, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Lothair, Orland, Rockledge, Orianna, Lowery, Barnhill and Minter. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
